headline: Netflix responds to concerns about WBD deal

headline: Netflix CEOs Seek to Reassure Staff About Warner Bros. Deal
summary: Netflix’s $82.7 billion bid for Warner Bros. streaming and studios businesses was agreed to by the Warner Bros. board but Paramount Skydance Corp. has swooped in with a hostile $108 billion bid for the entire company.  The Warner Bros. board is expected to respond to Paramount’s offer by the end of the week.

raw.headline: Netflix CEOs Seek to Reassure Staff About Warner Bros. Deal
raw.summary: Netflix’s $82.7 billion bid for Warner Bros. streaming and studios businesses was agreed to by the Warner Bros. board but Paramount Skydance Corp. has swooped in with a hostile $108 billion bid for the entire company.  The Warner Bros. board is expected to respond to Paramount’s offer by the end of the week.
